availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James A. Henshall (Hamilton County, Ohio, physician. )

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, physician. Maryland native. Son of James G. Henshall and Clarissa Henshall. Student in Baltimore, Maryland, in 1850. Physician in Cincinnati in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Mayland, Baltimore County, Baltimore, Ward 14, p. 427B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, Ward 2, p. 121.
